sources.title: Mystery Plane (1939) TAILSPIN TOMMY
sources.description:
Stars: John Trent, Marjorie Reynolds, Polly Ann Young 
Director: George Waggner 

A pilot invents a revolutionary bomb-targeting system, but before he can deliver it to the US Air Force, he is kidnapped by criminals who want to sell his plans to a foreign power!

sources.title: Mystery Plane (1939) Adventure, Crime, War
sources.description:
A famed war pilot (nicknamed "Tailspin Tommy") is held hostage for his bomb targeting invention.

Director: George Waggner 
Writers: Paul Schofield, George Waggner 
Stars: John Trent, Marjorie Reynolds, Milburn Stone 
Genres: Classics, Action, Adventure, Crime, Romance

CCC CHAPTERS: in the general comments, tell us your favorite scene or line in the movie, with a time stamp & we will add it here!
00:00 Full Length Movie
03:32 Captain 'Brandy' Rand aerial acrobatics
14:38 History of flight (1924 -1938) newspaper clippings montage
25;22 Bombs away & 1 minute freefall 
27:44 Tailspin Tommy

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: A pilot invents a revolutionary new bomb-targeting system. However, just before he is to deliver it to the Army Air Corps, he is kidnapped by a criminal gang who want to give the system to a foreign power, and threaten to kill his girlfriend unless he gives them the plans.
metadata.Writer: Paul Schofield, George Waggner, Hal Forrest
metadata.Actors: John Trent, Marjorie Reynolds, Milburn Stone
